FuncDef: The display isis error command displays the statistics of the incorrect Link State PDUs (LSPDUs) and Hello packets received by an interface or a process. The display isis error command displays the statistics of the incorrect Link State PDUs (LSPDUs) and Hello packets received by an interface or a process.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IS-IS process.
If no IS-IS process is specified, statistics about incorrect LSPs and Hello packets received by all local IS-IS processes are displayed.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.

Displays statistics about incorrect LSPs and Hello packets received by all interfaces.

Specifies the name of an interface.

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
